Text_Numeracy: for myself and my 12 yr old son both i feel fairly certain that i understood what is being said and what is being shown to me about our medical conditions
Text_Anxiety: i have been with my primary care doctor for over 5 years. i trust her and i feel that i have a good means of communication wuith her plus she always takes the time to sit with me and explain any issues i may have
Text_TrustPhys: because i have a few health conditions that are chronic i am always fearful she is going to find something else wrong with me
Text_SubjectiveLit: when i was told that i had fibromyalgia    i made sure i became as educated as possible   i read articles   joined support groups and kept in touch with my doctor

Text_Numeracy: I HAVE COMPLETE CAPACITY TO OBTAIN, PROCESS AND  UNDERSTAND BASIC HEALTH INFORMATION AND MAKE APPROPRIATE HEALTH DECISIONS.
Text_Anxiety: BEEN WITH HER FOR A VERY LONG.  SHE WALKED THROUGH BREAST CANCER WITH ME AND WORKED WITH ME TO DISCOVER  THE CAUSE OF OTHER HEALTH ISSUES I WAS HAVING.  SHE LISTENS AND DOES WHAT IT TAKES TO GET HER PATIENTS WELL.
Text_TrustPhys: I GET MOST ANXIOUS WHEN I'M HAVING A TEST AND HAVE TO WAIT FOR THE RESULTS.  THE UNKNOWN IS NERVE-RACKING.
Text_SubjectiveLit: WHEN I WAS DIAGNOSED WITH BREAST CANCER IN 2012 I HAD NO IDEA WHAT TO EXPECT.  I HAD NO KNOWLEDGE OF WHAT TO EXPECT FOR THE BIOPSY, THE TREATMENT, THE SURGERY, THE RECOVERY, OR THE RECONSTRUCTION. I LEARNED A LOT THROUGH THE PROCESS AND AM MUCH MORE AWARE OF MY BODY NOW.

Text_Numeracy: i understand what there saying and what i have to do and i make sure i ask all the questions i have
Text_Anxiety: i trust them because there honest and genuine and really nice also they really care about my health and well being
Text_TrustPhys: just having to see what they say and do and hoping im healthy also i get nervous when i go and try to hope things turn out well
Text_SubjectiveLit: i cant really think of one but i use the internet to find out information if i think something is wrong then i go to the doctor to see if im right

Text_Numeracy: I am capable of obtaining, processing and understanding basic health information.
Text_TrustPhys: I only get nervous about a bad diagnosis.
Text_SubjectiveLit: I had hypercalcemia. They removed one of my parathryoid glands. I had cervical dysplasia and a cone biopsy. My mom had thyroid cancer. I am anemic. I have high blood pressure. My mom had a brain aneurysm they coiled. My twin sister had a ruptured appendix, a bowel obstruction and a fibroid removed. Lots of family and friends with illnesses and surgeries.

Text_Numeracy: I feel i have the capacity to obtain, process, and understand my health information and services needed to make the correct health decisions. i am fully capable of reading and understanding the things about my health that are important and i am full capable of explaining my problems to a physician.
Text_Anxiety: I have complete trust in my primary care physician. Doctors are very educated about health and they know much more than i do about whats going on inside of me, so if i am told by my doctor that  i need to take certain meds or do a certain thing to fix a problem i am having, i will absolutely do it.
Text_TrustPhys: I am very paranoid about my health. The thing that makes me feel the most anxious or worried is me thinking about what could be wrong and what the doctor will tell me. I am always afraid he is going to give me horrible news.
Text_SubjectiveLit: My sister has epilepsy. I have gotten her through many seizures while waiting for an ambulance to show up. She had one seizure that was really bad once and i turned her on her side and held her until the shaking stopped and she started to wake up right as the ambulance got there.

Text_Numeracy: I am of sound mind and can understand medical information given to me. I can also make the appropriate health care decisions for myself.
Text_Anxiety: I only trust my physician, if he gives me honest answers about my health.  I have had physicians I did not trust in the past.
Text_TrustPhys: I have a gear of the telling me they have found something wrong with my health. I like my doctor to give me the truth.
Text_SubjectiveLit: I always keep track of my health and if I am experiencing any problems with my health. I would likely monitor my health

Text_Numeracy: I understand basic medical information so I don't need any help but my problem i after talking to the doctor and walking to the waiting room to leave I just forget about all that we talked about so I forget what the doctor tells me.
